sentences.sentence: The features of the commonly used chromatographic fingerprint evaluation methods are described and their range of application are defined.
sentences.translation: 对常用的色谱指纹图谱相似度评价方法的特性和应用范围进行了明确阐述和界定。

sentences.sentence: I cannot achieve the system suitability or signal-to-noise criteria with the described chromatographic method. Can I make any adjustments?
sentences.translation: 我不能达到色谱方法里所述的系统适用性或信噪比标准，我能做出调整吗？

sentences.sentence: Sugar recovery from molasses and betaine recovery are standard applications with the chromatographic systems and the activated carbon adsorption systems.
sentences.translation: 糖蜜中糖的回收、和甜菜碱的回收是代表性的色析技术系统和活性炭吸附系统应用例子。
